Goal Representation: ['1. Cook the chicken pasta.', '2. Put the chicken pasta on a plate.']

behavior cook_chicken_pasta(chicken:item, dry_pasta:item, pot:item, stove:item):
    body:
        bind cutting_board: item where:
            is_cutting_board(cutting_board)
        # Bind a cutting board for the task
        
        bind knife: item where:
            is_knife(knife)
        # Bind a knife for cutting
        
        achieve_inhand_knife(knife)
        place_chicken_on_board(chicken, cutting_board)
        slice_chicken(chicken, cutting_board, knife)
        
        fill_pot_with_water(pot)
        put_pot_on_stove(pot, stove)
        
        heat_stove(stove)
        place_chicken_in_pot(chicken, pot)
        put_dry_pasta_in_pot(dry_pasta, pot)
        # You may use a function like put_dry_pasta_in_pot to place pasta in the pot
        
        turn_off_stove(stove)
        remove_pot_from_stove(pot, stove)
        # You may use a function like remove_pot_from_stove to manage the pot

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Select a chicken
        
        bind dry_pasta: item where:
            is_dry_pasta(dry_pasta)
        # Select dry pasta
        
        bind pot: item where:
            is_pot(pot)
        # Select a cooking pot
        
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        # Select a stove
        
        cook_chicken_pasta(chicken, dry_pasta, pot, stove)
